affects:
ABILITY: Point Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc: Slams the ground with a mighty totem, creating an impassible ridge of stone while stunning and damaging enemy units in a line.
notes:
Creeps will wait for Fissure to disappear. They will not attempt to walk around it.
Fissure is not blocked by Linken's Sphere.
cmb:
125/140/155/170
15
lore: The Nishian totem splits the world to its core with tectonic force.
name: earthshaker_fissure

desc: Empowers Earthshaker's totem, causing it to deal extra damage on the next attack.
notes: Bonus damage is based on base damage and that given by primary attribute.
cmb:
20/30/40/50
5
lore: Raigor's gorilla strength can destroy mountains.
name: earthshaker_enchant_totem

desc: Causes the earth to shake underfoot, adding additional damage and stuns to nearby enemy units when Earthshaker casts his abilities.
notes: Using items does not trigger Aftershock.
lore: The earth trembles beneath the mighty footsteps of Raigor.
name: earthshaker_aftershock

affects:
ABILITY: No Target
DAMAGE TYPE: Magical
PIERCES SPELL IMMUNITY: No
desc:
Shockwaves travel through the ground, damaging enemy units. Each enemy hit causes an echo to damage nearby units.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Will not damage ethereal units, such as those in Ghost Form.
Units creating echoes also take damage from the wave they produced.
cmb:
145/205/265
150/130/110
lore: Tectonic plates crack, mountains fold, and foes are crushed by the Echo Slam.
name: earthshaker_echo_slam
